text: أَعَدَّ ٱللَّهُ لَهُمۡ جَنَّـٰتٖ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَاۚ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡفَوۡزُ ٱلۡعَظِيمُ

translation.en: Allah has prepared for them gardens beneath which rivers flow, wherein they will abide eternally. That is the great attainment
translation.id: Allah telah menyediakan bagi mereka surga yang mengalir di bawahnya sungai-sungai, mereka kekal di dalamnya. Itulah kemenangan yang agung
